Subject: Pop-Up Alert not show and change current webpage to block report
Description:
The client reports that when filling out forms, the EPP client, when blocked, causes all the information on the completed page to be lost, and a new page appears, never seen before blocked, probably this is a new functionality, which did not exist before. The problem is that it loads on the current page and the client is losing information either from the system, or from content filled out as forms.

Another reported problem is that the justification POP-UP, when it appears, because the client reports that it is not displayed frequently, and in routines where work on a document is long, if the 15 min time (defined by the client) is completed after the first release, the product does not display a new pop-up requesting a new justification.
Solution_Comment__c: The computers were not following the Global rights and the pop-up notifications were not shown correctly
